attributes.action: Take into account the rental history of renters when applying for a mortgage
attributes.additional_details: To help first time buyers purchase their own home
attributes.background: Pass legislation that forces Banks and lenders to take into account the rental payment history of long term renters when applying for a mortgage

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government

rejection.details: Credit reports and checks take into account the payment history of applicants including rental payments, and this is a matter for individual credit reference agencies in cooperation with lenders, not the Government or Parliament.
